document.title: Center for Health Science Research Newsletter, June 2012
document.abstract: The Research Newsletter is published by the Center for Health Science Research, College of Nursing. This publication is intended to highlight the latest in College of Nursing academic & research updates, opportunities, people, events, achievements, and goals.
document.publication-title: Center for Health Science Research Newsletter

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Hammett, M. L. (April, 2012). "Research Newsletter, April 2012 Issue." College of Nursing, The University of Tennessee, Koxville. Retreived from http://trace.tennessee.edu/utk_nursnews/6
